00022 
00023 #import <Foundation/Foundation.h>
00024 
00025 
00026 // If assertions are not blocked, add macros for class invariant
00027 #ifndef NS_BLOCK_ASSERTIONS
00028 
00029 // The ARAssertClassInvariant macro can be used to assert the class invariant holds within a class implementation
00030 #define ARAssertClassInvariant() [self ar_assertClassInvariantHolds]
00031 
00032 // The ARSuperClassInvariant can be used to get the super class invariant within a class implementation
00033 #define ARSuperClassInvariant [super ar_classInvariant]
00034 
00035 // The ARDefineClassInvariant can be used to define the class invariant within a class implementation
00036 #define ARDefineClassInvariant(cond) - (BOOL)ar_classInvariant { return (cond); }
00037 
00038 @interface NSObject (ARClassInvariant)
00039 
00040 - (BOOL)ar_classInvariant;
00041 - (void)ar_assertClassInvariantHolds;
00042 
00043 @end
00044 
00045 #else
00046 
00047 #define ARAssertClassInvariant()
00048 #define ARSuperClassInvariant
00049 #define ARDefineClassInvariant(cond)
00050 
00051 #endif
